name: Ayesha Rahman
description: Ayesha helps people choose the best indoor plants and teaches easy-care routines for busy lifestyles.

name: Tanvir Ahmed
description: Tanvir specializes in drought-tolerant plants and guides beginners on low-maintenance plant care.

name: Nusrat Jahan
description: Nusrat teaches how to keep flowering plants blooming longer and how to maintain healthy roots and soil.

name: Sabbir Hossain
description: Sabbir focuses on healthy soil mixtures, composting, and the best fertilizing techniques for long-term growth.
